Created attachment 560965
popup in between screens

I got this modal when starting up Firefox. I run with two displays of different sizes and the modal appeared bang smack in the middle of the two screens horizontally (half on one, the other on the other) and the middle of the larger screen vertically.

The result is that attachment, which was hard to read.
